description: Identifies when a application security group is modified or deleted. Author: Austin Songer. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Application security group being modified or deleted may be performed by a system administrator.
Verify whether the user identity, user agent, and/or hostname should be making changes in your environment.
Application security group modified or deleted from unfamiliar users should be investigated. If known behavior is causing false positives, it can be exempted from the rule.
name: Azure Application Security Group Modified or Deleted
